content:
I stumbled on a chat thread that ended up talking about the use of observation components. I don't think it changes how we're using it, but it's interesting to read what others think about using them as qualifiers for observations.
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/Pathology.20Lab.20Reports.20.E2.80.93.20Dynamic.20Function.20Tests.20.2F.20Timed.20Tests
